archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1317
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to learn more about how I can easily manage my services all in one place, so that I can decide if I want to purchase it.

properties.value: Generic information not related to any particular service. Rather a part of VF CMS, may be linked to particular offering page

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
